Dudley Leavitt

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Josiah Holderness
  3. Location of Family: Elmwood, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Elmwood, NE

  8. Date of Death: 1960-10-25, Elmwood, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: OTR, 350; Eloise Thomsen Corres. and unfinished biography; Alpha File.
